comment: Registry of manually overridden generated methods
description: When you override a generated method with a custom implementation, add it here to prevent regeneration
usage: Run 'zig build analyze -- InterfaceName' to automatically detect overrides

dispatchEvent.reason: Full DOM event propagation with capture/target/bubble phases (44 lines). EventTarget has simplified version (target-only). Node's version handles tree traversal for capture and bubble propagation.
